text: Amadou Gon Coulibaly (10 February 1959 – 8 July 2020) was an Ivorian politician. He was Prime Minister of Côte d'Ivoire from January 2017 to his death in July 2020. He was the ruling party's candidate in the 2020 Ivorian presidential election and was seen as the front-runner. Coulibaly died from heart surgery-related problems at a hospital in Abidjan on 8 July 2020, aged 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Ivory Coast Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:People from Abidjan
title: Amadou Gon Coulibaly
